header.name: Dr. Demonara & The Dungeon of Death
header.author: John Earegood (converted by System Converter)
header.description: A trap-heavy lair with false gems, demon statues, and Dr. Demonara.

rooms.name: Entrance Hall (Skull Idols)
rooms.description: Two skull idols in alcoves guard the door (shoot arrows when crossed). Central skull altar; bronze plaque: 'All who enter die screaming'.

rooms.name: Corpse Room
rooms.description: Multiple bodies hang on hooks, missing limbs—harvested by the Doctor.

rooms.name: Deep Pit Chamber
rooms.description: A deep pit yawns in the floor; something stirs below. Quiet!

rooms.name: The Black Gem Room
rooms.description: Damp, smells of the sea; a large drain in the floor. A black gem sits in a niche—an illusion. If opened, the gem vanishes, doors lock and water floods the room.

rooms.name: Blood Pit
rooms.description: Crossing the foul pit may attract a lurking monster from the depths.

rooms.name: Prison Cell
rooms.description: A prisoner in a cage; his eyes are gone—EVIL.

rooms.name: Doctor's Secret Treasure
rooms.description: Careful! The Doctor's hidden stash is trapped.

rooms.name: Red Mirror Room
rooms.description: A red mirror covered by cloth to hide its evil—look into it and die!

rooms.name: Dr's Private Office
rooms.description: Occult books, black-magic scrolls and more. BEWARE: the paintings are watching you!

rooms.name: Laboratory
rooms.description: Two demon statues sit in alcoves; two cages with mutated beasts near west wall. Viscous creatures: beasts attack if you get close; statues animate if searched.

rooms.name: Giant Stone Cobra
rooms.description: Statue guards a large gold bar (4000 gp). If removed, snakes pour out from wall holes—roll D20 for amount, D4 for bite damage.

rooms.name: Demon Statue with Red Gem
rooms.description: Statue holds a red gemstone; if you steal it, the statue attacks and the DOORS LOCK YOU IN!

rooms.name: Dr. Demonara
rooms.description: DR. DEMONARA appears every D4 rounds to attack. Claw Slice +1. Lair of the Doctor.

rooms.name: Dead End
rooms.description: A short passage that leads nowhere (trap nearby).

doors.notes: Black gem is illusion; opening niche locks doors and floods from drain.
Taking red gem animates statue and locks surrounding doors.
Leads past the red mirror (save-or-die if stared into).

game_elements.name: Skull Idol Arrow Trap
game_elements.notes: Arrows shoot when crossing the entrance idols.

game_elements.name: Black Gem Flood Trap
game_elements.notes: Gem is an illusion; opening causes doors to lock and room to flood from floor drain.

game_elements.name: Blood Pit Lurker
game_elements.notes: Crossing draws a monster up from the pit.

game_elements.name: Red Mirror Death Gaze
game_elements.notes: Look into the uncovered mirror—instant death (save at GM’s discretion).

game_elements.name: Watching Paintings
game_elements.notes: Paintings in private office surveil intruders; may trigger fear/charm.

game_elements.name: Lab Demon Statues
game_elements.notes: Two demon statues animate if searched; beasts in cages attack if approached.

game_elements.name: Gold Bar (4000 gp)
game_elements.notes: Guarded by giant stone cobra; removing spawns snakes from wall holes (D20 number, D4 bite damage).

game_elements.name: Snake Swarm Trigger
game_elements.notes: Triggered when gold bar is removed.

game_elements.name: Demon Gem Lockdown
game_elements.notes: Taking the red gem animates statue and locks adjacent doors.

game_elements.name: Prisoner with Hollow Eyes
game_elements.notes: EVIL influence; may provide clues or curses.

game_elements.name: Dr. Demonara
game_elements.notes: Appears every D4 rounds to attack. Claw Slice +1. Central boss room.

game_elements.name: Roaming Monsters Table (D12)
game_elements.notes: Rats, Cobra, Zombie, Bats, Ooze, Demon, Beast, Acid Roach, Death Spider, Flesh Maggots, Slimey Cube, Eyestalk—use map legend HP/AC.

game_elements.name: Traps Table (D6)
game_elements.notes: Arrows d6, Poison Gas d6, Ice Spray d6, Spin Blades d8, Fire Darts d8, Spike Clamp d8 damage.
